attributes.additional_details:
Wales is one of the poorest parts of the uk.
The seven bridge costs £6, £12.10 and £18.10 for cars, vans and lorries respectively.

With such a tax to entry and exit is it any wonder that few busisses that transport goods around the uk and to europe would want to relocate to Wales.

The tolls need to be scrapped and central funds diverted to stop this barrier to welsh trade and development
